page.title: 09Baptism
page.content: Every year the Evangelical church holds a Baptism service in the river Severn at Dolerw park.At a Baptism service the candidates for Baptism state that they have come to know God and are prepared to witness to others. When you are immersed in the river it means that you are cleanzed of your sins and the Holy Spirit comes into your life.At the service hymns were sung and portions of scripture were read.A chorus was sung when the people were immersed in the water.This year seven people were baptized and before being immersed some said their testimony and some read their favroite verses from the bible.Two deacons officiated at the service and the candidates for baptism were assisted in and out of the water by two other deacons.Candidates wear white clothes and it is a very moving experience.
